Hymn.Arabic: إِسْمَعِي يَا ابْنَتِي وَانْظُرِي وَأَمِيلِي سَمْعَكِ ، وَانْسَيْ شَعْبَكِ وَبَيْتَ أَبِيكِ ،
Hymn.English: 10 Listen, O daughter, Consider and incline your ear; Forget your own people also, and your father's house;

Hymn.Arabic: فَإِنَّ الْمَلِكَ قَدْ اشْتَهَى حُسْنَكِ ، لِأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّكِ هَلِّلُويَا
Hymn.English: 11 So the King will greatly desire your beauty; Because He is your Lord.     Alleluia
